==Translingual==

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=130|rad=肉|as=12|sn=16|four=70231|canj=BOGF}}

# the three divisions of the viscera (med.) Actually, in ancient [[w:Traditional Chinese Medicine|Traditional Chinese medicine]] (TCM), this word means the texture of tissues beneath skin and between muscles. Some scholars conclude this conceptual viscera in TCM should be related to [[:w:lymphatics|lymphatics]].
